articles.title: Earth 'has been lucky' to support life for 3 billion years, study says - Sky News

articles.title: Earth's Perihelion today - what is it and what does it mean for you? - Daily Express
articles.description: EARTH arrives at perihelion today, but many of us may not understand its significance. Express.co.uk explains what perihelion is and what this astronomical event means for the planet.

articles.title: Archaeology news: Medieval Chinese coin discovered in Hampshire 'genuinely ancient' - Daily Express
articles.description: ARCHAEOLOGY experts have uncovered rare Chinese currency in a Hampshire field, adding to evidence of interactions between Britain and east Asia as early as the 13th century.
